title: GROOVE YOUR TIRES & IMPROVE TRACTION: DIY FIX REALLY WORKS

tasks.task: Improving traction on off-road tires using a grooving tool.
subtasks: Purchasing a grooving tool from Amazon for approximately $100.
Using the tool with a metal knife attachment.
Cutting grooves into the tires to create extra edges for better traction.
Noting improved performance on slippery surfaces and in mud.
